```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
babies <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ervance1/Sp2018-Data-Science-repo/master/babies2a.dat")
babies <- rename(babies, bwtoz = `bwt/oz`)
babies <- na.omit(babies)
babies

ggplot(data = babies) +
  geom_bar(mapping = aes(x = Premature, y = ..prop.., group = 1),fill = "red")+
  facet_wrap(~smoke)+
  labs(title = "Premature Births for those who Smoke During Pregnancy vs. Those Who Don't")
  #legend("bottomright", legend = c("smokers", "nonsmokers"))
```
